sentences.en: A storm was bearing down upon Iceland.
sentences.cn: 一场风暴正向冰岛逼来.

sentences.en: As for those small countries ( Maldives , Iceland , Fiji ), they are ignored.
sentences.cn: 至于那些小国, 注定了在任何地方都是被忽视的一群.

sentences.en: Austria and Turkey beat out Iceland for the two seats allocated to this region.
sentences.cn: 奥地利和土耳其击败冰岛赢得该地区分配到的两个席位。

sentences.en: But they quickly asked Iceland for their money back.
sentences.cn: 但英国与荷兰很快就要求冰岛还钱.

sentences.en: Iceland becomes a self - governing kingdom, yet remains united with Denmark.
sentences.cn: 1918年,冰岛成为半自治的王国, 仍与丹麦保持联邦关系.

sentences.en: Iceland is full of hot springs, beautifully coloured rocks, and other natural wonders.
sentences.cn: 冰岛遍布温泉 、 美丽的五彩岩石和其他自然奇观.

sentences.en: Iceland is in the far north of the world.
Iceland is not really as cold and unpleasant as its name suggests.
sentences.cn: 冰岛其实不如国名所指的如此冰冷不适.

sentences.en: One year, Rudolph sailed all the way out to Iceland.
sentences.cn: 有一年, 鲁道夫远航到冰岛.

sentences.en: Overcast skies portend a rough day for boats on Iceland's Lake Myvatn.
sentences.cn: 阴云密布的天空为冰岛米湖上的船只预示了狂风暴雨的一天.

sentences.en: Pack ice around Iceland was becoming a threat to navigation.
sentences.cn: 冰岛周围的浮冰群曾一度对船只航行构成威胁。

sentences.en: Scotland were ahead in their European championship qualifier in Iceland.
sentences.cn: 苏格兰队在冰岛举行的欧洲杯预选赛中处于领先位置。

sentences.en: Switzerland, Sweden, Iceland, Denmark and Norway accounted for a combined $ 5,600 bn.
sentences.cn: 瑞士 、 瑞典 、 冰岛 、 丹麦和挪威总计为5.6万亿美元.

sentences.en: The girl from Iceland is as cold as an iceberg.
sentences.cn: 从冰岛来的女孩果然冷得像冰山一样.

sentences.en: The shrill media response in the UK was reported extensively in Iceland.
sentences.cn: 在冰岛,英国国内尖锐的媒体反应被广泛报道.

sentences.en: When he came home from photographing a story in Iceland, she was gone.
sentences.cn: 一次他从冰岛摄影回来, 她不在了.

sentences.en: WHICH country will be the next Iceland?
sentences.cn: 哪个国家会成为下一个冰岛？

trans.tran_cn: 冰岛（欧洲岛名，在大西洋北部，近北极圈）
